attributes.action: Discount the criminal Fiona Onasanya’s vote on No Deal
attributes.background: The woman is a convicted criminal that still wears a tag yet her vote has been taken over that of 17.4 million Leave voters. Her vote should not count on parliament and No Deal should still be an option.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it is not the UK Government or Parliament's responsibility to discount MPs' votes.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235755
